features: NOURISH YOUR SKIN: Enjoy velvety smooth, richly moisturized skin with the Hempz Herbal Body Moisturizer! With a light, tropical scent you’ll love, this moisturizing body lotion helps repair and condition skin so it is healthy and nourished.

ENRICHED LOTIONS: Our body lotion for women with dry skin is enriched with 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, which delivers amazing omega fatty acids, antioxidants, and skin-smoothing amino acids to help protect skin and lock in moisture.

EXCLUSIVE FORMULA: This creamy, smoothing body moisturizer lotion features Sugarcane and Papaya extracts to moisturize, condition and rejuvenate skin with Vitamins A, B, and C. Shea Butter provides Vitamin E .

PERFECT EVERYDAY LOTION: Our body lotions for women are ideal for normal and dry skin, and you will enjoy a tropical vacation in your own home with the light, sweet scent of Sugarcane and Papaya! It can be used every day for healthy, nourished skin.

SAFE FOR SKIN: At Hempz, we know how important it is to only use the finest products. Our body lotion moisturizer is made in the USA, 100% vegan, and it is dye-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, and so you know it will be gentle on skin.
body.description: Experience incredibly smooth, ultra-hydrated skin with the Hempz Herbal Body Moisturizer! This amazing dry skin lotion for women’s body is formulated with 100% pure, natural Hemp Seed Oil, which provides antioxidants, amino acids, and omega fatty acids to help protect skin and lock in moisture. It features the sweet, light scent of Sugarcane and Papaya so that you can enjoy a tropical vacation from the comfort of your own home! With a unique formula designed to repair and condition skin, this skin moisturizer for women’s body features Sugarcane and Papaya extracts, which help moisturize and rejuvenate skin with Vitamins A, B, and C, while also providing carotenoids. Shea Butter offers Vitamin E, a natural emollient that helps ward off free radical damage - keeping your skin healthy and fortifying its natural barrier! With a creamy, moisture-rich formula, these body lotions for dry skin are a perfect daily moisturizer to keep your skin radiant and velvety smooth. At Hempz, we are dedicated to providing high-quality, exceptional skincare products that we are sure you’ll love! Our moisturizing body lotion for dry skin is vegan and made in the USA, and it contains absolutely no parabens, gluten, THC, or dyes, so you can be certain it's safe and gentle. Hydrate and refresh your skin from head to toe with this luxurious vegan lotion for women - carefully designed to always keep your skin looking healthy and rejuvenated! Product Details: Fresh Fusions Sugarcane & Papaya Herbal Body Moisturizer - Size: 2.25 fl. oz. - Scent: Sugarcane & Papaya - Also available in 17 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t find this particle scent anywhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this based off of my experience from a coworker who given me some lotion for my ashy hands. I was in heaven! I ordered a small bottle as a tester because I wasn’t sure if I was going to like it. I didn’t like it. I LOVED IT!! It smells amazing and it leaves my skin feels so soft and silky. I will be ordering a bigger bottle soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just received my lotion and can't wait to jump in the shower to be able to put this on afterwards smells awesome and moisturizer cream thats not greasy!!
